gaia::core::WorkItem Class Reference

#include <WorkItem.h>

Detailed Description

This class is used to define single portions of task to be dispatched to a single WorkQueue.

Derive from this class and implement the run() to create specific task that can be executed on a WorkQueue.

See also:
WorkQueue

The following example demonstrates how to use the WorkItem class.

 #include <gaia/core/WorkItem.h>
 
 using namespace gaia::core;

 class MyWorkItem : public WorkItem
 {
 public:
     void run()
     {
         // Do some job here
     }
 };

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::core::WorkItem::run ( ) [pure virtual]

Executes the task.

This method is an executable body of the task.

Remarks:
Classes which inherit WorkItem must implement the run() method.
